data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 18,590 believers in Jalaun against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jalaun, Uttar Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Jalaun, Uttar Pradesh, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Jalaun, Uttar Pradesh, India. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Jalaun, Uttar Pradesh, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Sahariya people.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,690,000 people living in the county of Jalaun.
Father, we ask for 338 new simple churches in the county of Jalaun, Uttar Pradesh, India. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,690,000 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Jalaun.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

location.name: Jalaun
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Bhagor, Barahar, Hammal, Kirar, Khangar (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Brahmin Bhagor (97,000), Barahar (123,000), Hammal (1,600), Kirar (882,000), Khangar (Hindu traditions) (342,000)
